message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can find a price closer to the value I place on the product. I would like to propose a price of $850000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $875000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to me.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $860000.

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $880000. I'm willing to give you a slight discount and offer you the product for $880000. This is the best price I can offer, considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $870000.
I'm not willing to go below $890000, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $885000. This is the best price I can offer, considering the product's value to me.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $875000.
I'm not willing to go below $900000, Bob. I'm willing to give you a slight discount and offer you the product for $890000. This is the best price I can offer, considering the product's value to me.
Thank you for your efforts, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $880000.
